ob.title: Konstruasion de Oranjbosk-Neoburg komens
ob.content:
Konstruasion de nov urbblok este de Oranjbosk komensav presidiurne. Ist nov teritori, temporare nomed "Neoburg", konsistero eks seks regioni 10x10 posed este de Rut Verdbosket e norde de Pont Poplik. Du regioni leplu sudik, sablpetros angulbutik e petrbrikos kontor, av ya esed perfasied.

Densitet imagined de Neoburg kontrast forte ko Ansianburg plu aperied e subevolved ueste de Pont Sanguinoranj, e it ya av plani de ekspandar Neoburg versu est mediu plu regioni e rutekstendasioni.

en.title: Construction of Orangewood-New Town begins
en.content:
The construction of a new city block in Orangewood's east started yesterday. This new area, temporarily named "New Town", will consist of six 10x10 plots located east of Greenwood Road and north of People's Bridge. The two southernmost plots, a sandstone corner shop and a stone bricks office building, have already been completed.

The envisioned density of New Town is in stark contrast to the more open and underdeveloped Old Town west of Bloodorange Bridge, and there are already plans of expanding New Town eastward with more plots and road extensions.
